def main():
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    print(l[-1] - l[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    prices = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    print(sum(prices[:k])) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

p.sort()

def main():
    pass

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    k = int(input())
    res = ''
    for c in s:
        if c.islower():
            res += chr((ord(c) - ord('a') + k) % 26 + ord('a'))
        elif c.isupper():
            res += chr((ord(c) - ord('A') + k) % 26 + ord('A'))
        else:
            res += c
    print(res)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    prices = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())), reverse=True)
    print(sum(prices[:k]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    prices = list(map(int, input().split()))
    prices.sort()
    print(sum(prices[:k]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

# input
N, K = map(int, input().split())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

# sort
p.sort()

# output
print(sum(p[:K]))

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    prices = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    print(sum(prices[:k]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# coding: utf-8

# input
N, K = map(int, input().split())
p = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

# sort
p.sort()

# output
print(sum(p[:K]))
